parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Saul -- first king of Israel, also an Edomite and two Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - masculine singular construct
str2: A man as an individual, a male person
Israel -- 'God strives', another name of Jacob and his desc

parse: Verb - Nifal - Perfect - third person common plural
str2: To gather for, any purpose, to receive, take away, remove

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine plural
str2: To incline, to decline, to pitch a, tent, gen, to encamp
Elah -- 'terebinth', an Israelite name, also an Edomite name

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine plural
str2: To set in a, row, arrange, put in order
